item.description:
oSlippery Sneakers Zydeco Band at RISDI, Fri, Feb 11, 2011 at 5PM-8:30PM.

Performance. Cover $5 (RI Zydeco, Creole, Swing)

 Rhode Island school of design 224 Benefit Street, Providence, RI 02903-2711 ,

Medium Dance Floor, No Smoking
Cover $5, 5:00PM to 8:30PM


Please use the Chace Center entrance at 20
North Main St, Providence; not Benefit St.
entrance!

Anyone interested in carpooling?
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a few other meet up groups there. I will have a meet-up sign on the table.
item.why: This is a great band, and fun dancing.
item.name: Zydeco dancing
